definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fight, do battle (NH Hithp.; [[ואלתחם]] MI:11.15.19 perh. = order the battle, cf. Nö:ZMG xl. 1886, 721; Ar. lah.ama fit close together, so NH [[לחם]] Pi., Syr. lh.m Pa, unite, loh.em fit also threaten; Gerber:Verb. Denom. 59 thinks vb. in Heb. denom. fr. [[מִלְחָמָה]] battle-line, but dub.);—†

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (poet.) only Imv. ms. and Pt. act.—fight, do battle with, rare, only Psalm Psalm, appar. later usage:—[[לְחַם אֶת־לֽחֲמָָי]] Ps 35:1 do battle with those battling with me (dub. whether [[את]] is acc. sign cr prep. with, cf. Ol; ‖[[רִיבָה אֶת־יְרִיבַי]]); [[לֽחֲמִים לִי]] Ps 56:3 doing battle against me; [[לֽחֵם]] v:Ps 56:2 as subst. fighter.†

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: :167 Pf. [[נִלְחַם]] Ju Jdg 9:17 +, [[וְנִלְחַמְתָּ֫]] Jdg 11:8, 1Sa 15:18, [[וְנִלְחַמְנוּ]] De 1:41 consec., etc.; Impf. [[יִלָּהֵם]] Ex 14:14, De 1:30; [[יִלָּ֫חֶם לָָנוּ]] Ne 4:14, [[וַיִּלָּ֫חֶם]] Ex 17:8 + 19 t.; 3 fs. [[תִּלָּחֵם]] Zec 14:14; 3 mpl. [[תִּיִּלָּֽחֲמוּ]] Ju Jdg 1:5 + 13 t.; sf. [[וַיִּלָּֽחֲמוּנִי]] Ps 109:3; 2 mpl. [[תִּלָּֽחֲמוּ]] 1Ki 22:31 + 4 t.; [[תִּלָּֽחֲמוּן]] 1Ki 12:24.; etc.; Imv. [[הִלָּחֵם]] Ex 17:9, 1Sa 18:17; [[הִלָּ֫חֶם בּוֹ]] Ju Jdg 9:38; pl. [[הִלָּֽחֲמוּ]] 2Ki 10:3, Ne 4:8; Inf. abs. [[נִלְחׂם]] Ju Jdg 11:25; cstr. [[הִלָּחֵם]] Jdg 1:9 + 35 t.; [[הִלָּ֫חֶם בּוֹ]] etc., Nu 22:11 + 6 t.; sf. [[הִלָּחֲמוֹ]] 2Ki 8:29 + 3 t.; Pt. [[נִלְחָם]] Ex 14:24 + 10 t.; pl. [[נִלְחָמִים]] Jos 10:25 + 10 t. (but 1Sa 31:1 rd. rather [[נִלְחֲמוּ]], so ‖ 1Ch 10:1 We Klo Bu, cf. Dr);—engage in battle (recipr.), sometimes wage war (Jos 10:5, Ju Jdg 11:5, 1Ki 14:19, 1Ki 22:46, 2Ki 6:8, 2Ki 14:28 etc.), oft. c. [[בְּ]] of enemy (60 t.) Ex 1:10, Ex 17:9, Ex 17:10, Nu 21:23, Nu 21:26, Nu 22:11 (all E), Ju Jdg 11:8, Jdg 11:25, 1Sa 15:18, 2Sa 8:10 + (49 t.); less oft. c. [[בְּ]] of city attacked or besieged †Ju Jdg 9:45, 1Sa 23:1, 2Sa 12:26, 2Sa 12:27, 2Sa 12:29, Is 20:1, Jos 10:31 (D), 1Ki 20:1, Ne 4:2; of tower Ju 1:52; sq. [[בְּאַרְחִי]] Jdg 11:12†; also c. [[עִם]] of enemy (26 t.): Ju Jdg 5:20, Jdg 11:4, Jdg 11:5, Jdg 11:20, Jos 11:5 (JE), 1Sa 13:5, 1Sa 17:19, also 1Sa 17:32, 1Sa 17:33 (of single combat), De 20:4, Jos 9:2 (both D), 2Ki 13:12, 2Ki 14:15, 2Ch 11:1, 2Ch 17:10, 2Ch 27:5, Da 10:20, Da 11:11 +; c. [[עִם]] of city †Jos 10:29 (D), Jos 19:47 (JE)†; c [[אֶת־]] = with, of enemy, †Jos 24:8 (E), 1Sa 17:9 (single combat), Je 21:5, 1Ki 20:23, 2Ki 19:9 = Is 37:9, Je 37:10; also Ju Jdg 12:4, 2Sa 11:17, 2Sa 21:15, 1Ki 22:31, 2Ki 8:2, 2Ki 9:15, Je 21:4, Je 32:5, Je 33:5, 2Ch 18:30, 2Ch 22:6, and c. [[אוֹתָם]] (= [[אִתָּם]]) Jos 10:25 (D), 1Ki 20:25 (Kö:Lgb. ii, 296)†; c. [[עִל]], against, of enemy only Je 21:2; elsewhere (16 t.) of city: †Jos 10:5 (JE), Is 7:1, 2Ki 12:18, 2Ki 19:8 = Is 37:8; esp. D and Je: De 20:10, De 20:19, Jos 10:34, Jos 10:36, Jos 10:38 (all D), Je 32:24, Je 32:29, Je 34:1, Je 34:7, Je 34:8, Je 34:22†; c. [[אֶל־]] of enemy †Je 1:19, Je 15:20†; c. sf. [[וַיִּלָּֽחֲמוּנִי]] † Ps 109:3 and they have fought against me†; c. [[יָ֑חַד]] i.e. fight together = with (against) one another †1Sa 17:10; abs. c. acc. cogn. [[מִלְחָמוֹת]] fight battles †1Sa 8:20, 1Sa 18:17, 1Sa 25:28, 2Ch 32:8†; abs. elsewhere Ju Jdg 5:19, Jdg 5:19, Jdg 5:20, De 1:41, Zec 10:5 + 26 t. + [[וַיׇּסֻרוּ עָלָיו לְהִלָּחֵָם]] 1Ki 22:32; †c. [[עַל]] for, in behalf of, Ju Jdg 9:17, 2Ki 10:3, Ne 4:8; c. [[לְ]] = id., Ex 14:14 (J), v:Ex 14:25 (J; + [[בְּ]] of enemy), De 1:30, De 3:22, De 20:4 (+ [[עִם]] of enemy, vid. supra), Jos 10:14, Jos 10:42, Jos 23:3, Jos 23:10 (all D), Ne 4:14† ´[[יׇכׂל לְהִלּ]] be able to fight, c. [[את]] of enemy 1Sa 17:9, c. [[בְּ]] of enemy Nu 22:11, = be successful in fighting, prevail against; so c. [[עַל]] of city Is 7:1, and abs. 2Ki 16:5 (after [[וַיׇּחֻרוּ עָל]] besiege).
